```{=html}
<form action="http://localhost:5169/process" method="POST">
    <fieldset>
        <legend><strong>Enter the desired temperature for your Koozie! Please only enter a number from ## - ##</strong></legend>

        <label for="desired_temp">Desired Temperature:</label>
        <input type="number" name="user_desiredtemp" required>
        <br><br>

        <button type="submit">Submit</button>
    </fieldset>
</form>
```
